div.h4: HPS to move to Distance Learning. Posted Date: 03/25/2020
div.p: The Oklahoma State Board of Education has approved for school districts to implement Distance Learning starting April 6th. We understand that there are many questions that go along with this . . .

div.h4: Yearbooks are on sale for $40! Click the link in the article! Posted Date: 01/08/2020

div.p: Hulbert Public Schools is dedicated to doing everything we can to stop and prevent bullying in all ages. To help in the fight against bullying we have launched a webpage. . . .

hr.p: For information on Parent's Rights, click here or log on to: http://www.ok.gov/sde/documents-forms. Scroll to the bottom of Individual Education Plan (IEP) Forms sections to download.
Hulbert Public Schools is looking for:

If you have a concern or you suspect your child may have a disability and need special education services or related services, please contact: Hulbert Public Schools, Special Services Department, (918) 772-2501, when prompted choose high school, then special services.
